<h2>Drag&Drop Editor for MailWizz EMA</h2>

This extension adds a powerful Drag&Drop Editor for your <a title="MailWizz - The Email Marketing Application" href="http://codecanyon.net/item/mailwizz-email-marketing-application/6122150">MailWizz EMA</a>!<br /><br />

<h3><strong>INSTALL in a few easy steps</strong></h3>
- Login in the backend of your <a title="MailWizz - The Email Marketing Application" href="http://codecanyon.net/item/mailwizz-email-marketing-application/6122150">MailWizz EMA</a> powered website and navigate to Extensions menu.<br />
- Hit the upload button and select the extension archive and upload it.<br />
- Enable the extension then click on it's title to go to the extension page from where you can input your details.<br />

<h3><strong>Enable/Disable Filemanager</strong></h3>
Drag&Drop Editor use the same standard file manager, so to enable/disable you go to CKEditor options (Extends->Extensions->CKeditor)
<br />


<h3><strong>REQUIREMENTS</strong></h3>
Mailwizz EMA >= 1.4.1 <br />
